price: او له هغه وروسته مو نه د ده په قوم له اسمانه كوم لښكر راكوز كړ او نه يې موږ راكوزونكي وو.
arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wamā anzalnā ʿalā qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina al-samāi wamā kunnā munzilīna
